name: OcelotEntityHelper
description: The OcelotEntityHelper class provides specialized access to ocelot entities in Minecraft, offering methods to monitor and interact with ocelot-specific behaviors such as trust states and feeding mechanics.
overview:
This class extends AnimalEntityHelper and inherits all functionality for animals including breeding, food preferences, and basic animal behaviors.

This helper is particularly useful for creating scripts that manage ocelot interactions, monitor ocelot behavior patterns, track ocelot trust status for breeding or companion purposes, or coordinate with ocelots in jungle biomes.

methods.name: isTrusting
methods.description: Check if an ocelot trusts the player (won't run away).
